history.text: Hello
Hello
Have you seen the movie The Avengers?
I have. I thought it was a really good movie. Have you seen it?
I have not, but I hear that it is really good
It is, they do a great job of bringing super heroes together
I have seen a few other marvel movies that it relates to like Iron man
Iron Man played a key role in stopping Loki from ruining Earth
It has a great list of popular actors also
Yes! Robert Downey Jr. & Scarlett Johansson are 2 of my favorites
They are really good. Plus I just found out it has a 9/10 rating
Yes! Rotten Tomatoes gave it a 92% which is exceptionally high for movies.
The only hero I have never heard of is Hawkeye
He is one of the lesser known ones and does not play a particular huge role in this movie.

Must be why I do not know him. Im surprised
 to notice it came out 6 years ago
It definitely feels like it was just last year. Time sure does fly. Joss Wheldon did a really good job at directing this film.
Do you know if he directs other Marvel movies?
He has written many TV shows but I do not think he has done any other movies.
Would you say it is pretty accurate to the other movies and comics, since it combines heros
Yes definitely. It does a good job of bringing all of the characters together into one movie.
Thats good. I hate when crossovers do not stay to true to the originals
I think Marvel does a good job overall with all of their productions.
I know they have been fairly accurate in the movies I have seen before. Do you think there will be more avengers movies?
I think in the future there will be interest again and there will be more movies.

So what is the villain
 in the movie?
Loki, who is actually Thor's brother. He wants to subjugate Earth
Seems like a good way to create a conflict in the movie. Adding in brothers to fight makes it more interesting
Yeah it puts a twist into things throughout the movie.
Thats good
